name: cloudflare-vless-worker
description: Cloudflare Worker for VLESS proxy with obfuscation and generated files

scripts.obfuscate: npm run build:raw && npx javascript-obfuscator dist/worker.raw.js --output worker.js && cp worker.js dist/worker.obfuscated.js
scripts.deploy:raw: npm run build:raw && wrangler deploy dist/worker.raw.js

author: NiREvil
